member.name: T:SharpVectors.Dom.Document
member.summary: The base implementation of an XML document to support both SVG and CSS documents.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.MutationEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to enable or disable mutation events.
member.value: A value specifying whether to enable or disable mutation events. The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.ExternalResourcesAccessMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how to handled external resources.
member.value: An enumeration of the type specifying the access mode. The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.CanUseBitmap
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if image elements will render bitmaps.
member.value: A value specifying how bitmaps are rendered. If elements will render bitmaps; otherwise, it is elements will not render bitmaps. The default is .

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.ReplacedText(SharpVectors.Dom.INode)
member.summary: A method to be called when some text was changed in a text node, so that live objects can be notified.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.DeletedText(SharpVectors.Dom.INode,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: A method to be called when some text was deleted from a text node, so that live objects can be notified.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.InsertedText(SharpVectors.Dom.INode,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: A method to be called when some text was inserted into a text node, so that live objects can be notified.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.ModifyingCharacterData(SharpVectors.Dom.INode)
member.summary: A method to be called when a character data node has been modified.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.ModifiedCharacterData(SharpVectors.Dom.INode,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A method to be called when a character data node has been modified.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.InsertingNode(SharpVectors.Dom.INode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A method to be called when a node is about to be inserted in the tree.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.InsertedNode(SharpVectors.Dom.INode,SharpVectors.Dom.INode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A method to be called when a node has been inserted in the tree.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.RemovingNode(SharpVectors.Dom.INode,SharpVectors.Dom.INode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A method to be called when a node is about to be removed from the tree.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.RemovedNode(SharpVectors.Dom.INode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A method to be called when a node has been removed from the tree.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.replacingNode(SharpVectors.Dom.INode)
member.summary: A method to be called when a node is about to be replaced in the tree.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.ReplacedNode(SharpVectors.Dom.INode)
member.summary: A method to be called when a node has been replaced in the tree.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.ModifiedAttrValue(SharpVectors.Dom.IAttribute,System.String)
member.summary: A method to be called when an attribute value has been modified.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.SetAttrNode(SharpVectors.Dom.IAttribute,SharpVectors.Dom.IAttribute)
member.summary: A method to be called when an attribute node has been set.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.RemovedAttrNode(SharpVectors.Dom.IAttribute,SharpVectors.Dom.INode,System.String)
member.summary: A method to be called when an attribute node has been removed.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.RenamedAttrNode(SharpVectors.Dom.IAttribute,SharpVectors.Dom.IAttribute)
member.summary: A method to be called when an attribute node has been renamed.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Dom.Document.RenamedElement(SharpVectors.Dom.IElement,SharpVectors.Dom.IElement)
member.summary: A method to be called when an element has been renamed.

member.name: T:SharpVectors.Dom.ExternalResourcesAccessModes
member.summary: This provides possible options to controls how external resources will be handled.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Dom.ExternalResourcesAccessModes.Allow
member.summary: An option that allows access of external resources.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Dom.ExternalResourcesAccessModes.Ignore
member.summary: An option that ignores access of external resources.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Dom.ExternalResourcesAccessModes.ThrowError
member.summary: An option that throws error on access of a external resource.
